Solution:
TGTTGATGCCGTGCTTGTAA
The LCS Scoring Matrix, Backtracking Matrix, and solution for sequences S2(GTCGTTCGGAATGCCGTTGCTCTGTAAA) and S4(CTTGCTTAAATGTGCA):

Scoring Matrix:
        G    T    C    G    T    T    C    G    G    A    A    T    G    C    C    G    T    T    G    C    T    C    T    G    T    A    A    A

Solution:
CTTGAATGTGCA
The LCS Scoring Matrix, Backtracking Matrix, and solution for sequences S3(ATTGCATTGCATGGGCGCGATGCATTTGGTTAATTCCTCG) and S4(CTTGCTTAAATGTGCA):

Solution:
TTGCTTAAATGTG

In addition, here is the example strings used in the accompanying paper operating in O(nxm) time:

Scoring Matrix:
        c    o    m    m    a    n    d 
   c    1    1    1    1    1    1    1 
   o    1    2    2    2    2    2    2 
   m    1    2    3    3    3    3    3 
   b    1    2    3    3    3    3    3 
   e    1    2    3    3    3    3    3 
   d    1    2    3    3    3    3    4 

Backtracking Matrix:
        c    o    m    m    a    n    d 
   c    3    1    1    1    1    1    1 
   o    2    3    1    1    1    1    1 
   m    2    2    3    1    1    1    1 
   b    2    2    2    2    2    2    2 
   e    2    2    2    2    2    2    2 
   d    2    2    2    2    2    2    3 

Solution:
comd

And the same string computed using the recursive algorithm operating in O(2^n) time:
comd
